price: 54. Alobi: Ya soló, bino na bango bozalaki na libunga ya polele.
arabic: قَالَ لَقَدۡ كُنتُمۡ أَنتُمۡ وَءَابَآؤُكُمۡ فِي ضَلَٰلٖ مُّبِينٖ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: qāla laqad kuntum antum waābāukum fī ḍalālin mubīnin
